ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 3
ComicInfo.Summary:
Just when the two Galactica crews are becoming adjusted to each other, a brand-new surprise comes through the wormhole. Meanwhile the match that fans have been demanding happens: Starbuck fraks Starbuck. Which you know is going to lead to nothing but trouble. While that’s going on, Baltargets a most unexpected visitor.
